decision_conditions:
Reason : 1 - This proposal CONSTITUTES DEVELOPMENT within the meaning of Section 55 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, and a planning application IS REQUIRED.

The existing outbuilding has an overall height that exceeds the limitations set out under criteria E.1(e) (ii) of Schedule 2, Part 1, Class E of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 (as amended).

Reason : 2 - This proposal CONSTITUTES DEVELOPMENT within the meaning of Section 55 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, and a planning application IS REQUIRED.

The existing outbuilding has an eaves that exceeds the limitations set out under criteria E.1(f) of Schedule 2, Part 1, Class E of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 (as amended).

Reason : 3 - This proposal CONSTITUTES DEVELOPMENT within the meaning of Section 55 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, and a planning application IS REQUIRED. 

This is because the outbuilding has what appears to be a bathroom which is not considered to be of a purpose incidental to the existing dwellinghouse and therefore falls outside the scope of Class E Part 1 Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Develpent) Order 2015 (as amended).

Reason : 4 - This proposal CONSTITUTES DEVELOMENT within the meaning of Section 55 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 and a planning application IS REQUIRED.  

The proposed conversion of the outbuilding to incidental, given its combined scale, absence of justification to demonstrate why it was not possible to accommodate the activities in the enlarged dwelling and lack of satisfactory demonstration that the outbuilding is reasonably required for purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the main dwellinghouse fails to demonstrate compliance with Schedule 2, Part 1, Class E of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015, as amended.
description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED CONVERSION OF EXISTING OUTBUILDING INTO AN OFFICE AND PLAYROOM
